tumor_size_max_dimension_evidence: No information provided in the pathology report.
pT_evidence: The tumor classification as adenocarcinoma of the lung showing a predominantly tubulopapillary structural pattern and pleural invasion.
pN_evidence: The tumor classification as adenocarcinoma of the lung showing a predominantly tubulopapillary structural pattern and no lymph node metastasis.
tumor_stage_evidence: The tumor classification as adenocarcinoma of the lung showing a predominantly tubulopapillary structural pattern, pleural invasion and distant metastasis (PUL).
histologic_diagnosis_stated: Mixed adenocarcinoma of the middle with pleural invasion
histologic_diagnosis_evidence: The tumor classification as adenocarcinoma of the lung showing a predominantly tubulopapillary structural pattern and pleural invasion, confirmed by immunohistochemical analysis (CK7 positive throughout, CK20 negative, TTF1.positive).
comment: The pathology report describes a mixed adenocarcinoma of the lung with pleural invasion and distant metastasis. The tumor classification is consistent with a Stage IV diagnosis according to AJCC 7th edition criteria. Immunohistochemical analysis confirms the diagnosis of lung adenocarcinoma.
